glsa.title: QtGui: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A NULL pointer dereference in QtGui could lead to Denial of Service.

background.p: QtGui is the GUI module and platform plugins for the Qt5 framework.

description.p: A NULL pointer dereference has been found in QtGui.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted GIF image, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All QtGui users should upgrade to the latest version:
